entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers and flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
